= Frequently Asked Questions =

== How to read and display vector or expression data ==

Aptx can be used to display vector or expression data associated with tree nodes:

  1 Ensure the configuration file contains this line: "show_vector_data:               display yes"

  2 Start Aptx and read in a tree ([http://forester.googlecode.com/files/apaf.xml example tree])

  3 Open "Tools" menu and select "read Vector/Expression Values"
